title: Kanaya Blouse
description:
(klik di logo Hijup ini ^ untuk melakukan pembelian) 

Edisi kali ini, Purukambera menghadirkan tema “Carita Priangan”. Terinspirasi dari kota Bandung, tempat dimana brand Purukambera ini lahir, sekaligus juga merayakan hari jadi kota bandung yang ke 209 dibulan September ini. Slogan “silih asah silih asuh silih asih” ada didesain dengan aksara sunda. 

-

Come in 4 choices lovely colour, or adopt them all.

LIMITED STOCK. 
available at website and apps HIJUP.com

title: IDEN
description:
Puru Kambera x Blibli.com / Star Wars Series

--

Star Wars IX Series establishes a dialogue between film and hijab. This series adapted from a very popular movie. To raise the appropriate theme, we chose to tell the story of a very iconic fighter in the Star Wars movie, as well as the main character of Star Wars IX, Kylo Ren. By bringing different cultural influences together, we mix it with floral pattern and Batik.

Last but not least, to represent hijab as female, we decided to named the article same with female characters in the movie.

--

all collection exclusively available only at Blibli.com

title: LEIA
description:
Puru Kambera x Blibli.com / Star Wars Series

--

Star Wars IX Series establishes a dialogue between film and hijab. This series adapted from a very popular movie. To raise the appropriate theme, we chose to tell the story of a very iconic fighter in the Star Wars movie, as well as the main character of Star Wars IX, Kylo Ren. By bringing different cultural influences together, we mix it with floral pattern and Batik.

Last but not least, to represent hijab as female, we decided to named the article same with female characters in the movie.

--

all collection exclusively available only at Blibli.com
content:
Puru Kambera x Blibli.com / Star Wars Series

--

Star Wars IX Series establishes a dialogue between film and hijab. This series adapted from a very popular movie. To raise the appropriate theme, we chose to tell the story of a very iconic fighter in the Star Wars movie, as well as the main character of Star Wars IX, Kylo Ren. By bringing different cultural influences together, we mix it with floral pattern and Batik.

Last but not least, to represent hijab as female, we decided to named the article same with female characters in the movie.

--

all collection exclusively available only at Blibli.com

title: SABINE
description:
Puru Kambera x Blibli.com / Star Wars Series

--

Star Wars IX Series establishes a dialogue between film and hijab. This series adapted from a very popular movie. To raise the appropriate theme, we chose to tell the story of a very iconic fighter in the Star Wars movie, as well as the main character of Star Wars IX, Kylo Ren. By bringing different cultural influences together, we mix it with floral pattern and Batik.

Last but not least, to represent hijab as female, we decided to named the article same with female characters in the movie.

--

all collection exclusively available only at Blibli.com

Star Wars IX Series establishes a dialogue between film and hijab. This series adapted from a very popular movie. To raise the appropriate theme, we chose to tell the story of a very iconic fighter in the Star Wars movie, as well as the main character of Star Wars IX, Kylo Ren. By bringing different cultural influences together, we mix it with floral pattern and Batik.

Last but not least, to represent hijab as female, we decided to named the article same with female characters in the movie.

--

all collection exclusively available only at Blibli.com
